author: newsr.in
title: 'Shaam Ko Mil': Twitter mocks Gautam Gambhir's juvenile spat with Manoj Tiwary - newsR
text: Gautam Gambhi started: " Shaam ko mil tujhe maroonga (Meet me in the evening, I will hit you). And Tiwary retorted, saying: "Shaam kya abhi bahar chal (Why wait till evening, let's go out and settle it now"). Â»
